objects.text:
• Spacious Stylish Design
• Premium Faux Leather
• Gold-Tone Hardware
• Perfect Everyday Size

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner features a stylish product layout focused on a fashion accessory. It's split diagonally with a smooth gradient background in rich earth tones transitioning from deep sienna on the top left to a creamy beige toward the bottom right. Subtle gold accent graphics, including abstract shapes and diagonal overlays, add a modern and elegant touch.

The layout includes a bold headline with two prominent text layers `heading_1` and `heading_2`. Below it is a tagline text `tagline` in a rounded font. A description block `description` outlines product features in a bullet format. The price is displayed boldly in text element `price`, and a rectangular button `cta_button` with the call-to-action `cta` invites interaction. To the right, the main focus is a high-resolution image of a fashionable tote bag (`product_image`), slightly overlapping the background break.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Sienna (#8B4513)
- Chestnut Brown (#A0522D)
- Cream Beige (#F5F5DC)
- Pale Gold (#D4AF37)
- Bright Gold (#FFD700)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Black (#000000)

Overall, the banner presents a premium and stylish tone suitable for fashion promotions.
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag in a warm, muted camel brown color (#A36E51), which forms the base of the color palette for an advertisement banner. The gold metallic accents (#D4AF37) on the hardware, chains, and branding elements enhance the overall luxurious feel. These two tones blend harmoniously, with the matte brown providing a neutral, earthy foundation while the metallic gold adds a striking contrast and a premium highlight. The subtle texture of the bag adds depth, allowing light to play softly across the surface. A complementary beige or cream background (#F5F5DC) would elevate this palette in a banner design.
